DOC.brief_summary: Many woman likely experience sexual problem lifetime . The Prevalence Female Sexual Problems Associated Distress Determinants Treatment Seeking ( PRESIDE ) study survey 30,000 U.S. woman age > 18 year regard sexual function . Results study estimate 12 % woman experience diagnosable sexual disorder cause personal distress , lack sexual desire prevalent . - See : http : //www.uspharmacist.com/content/d/featured_articles/c/56908/ # sthash.LTDkyRlR.dpuf
DOC.brief_title: Female Sexual Dysfunction , Risks Outcomes ( FSFI )
DOC.detailed_description: Standard care include completion sexual dysfunctional questionnaire every visit . This study collect information questionnaire office visit follow patient outcome successful non successful treatment . The purpose study collect analyze data characteristic woman present sexual dysfunction , evaluate risk factor contribute sexual dysfunction evaluate factor contribute successful treatment sexual dysfunction . Upon visit office participant complete Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) , standard care patient . Research related procedure include : Review questionnaires collect data medical record regard medical history , treatment outcome . If participant return office follow visit ( final visit ) final questionnaire send preference ( e-mail , phone , mail ) note consent form . Participates also give option participate `` future storage data '' . Future test area female sexual dysfunction . Data identify code number research staff Saint Louis University access data .
DOC.criteria: Female 18 89 year age Being treat Saint Louis University Clinic Sexual Dysfunction
